results.summary_short: Pregnant high school dropout meets moody electronics genius. Richly detailed, via Hal Hartley.

results.summary_short: Private eye on a hot tin roof.  Turner's sly and witty; the movie isn't.

results.summary_short: Young Guns meet organized crime. Awash in violence and blood, and surprisingly dull.

results.summary_short: And how. Garbage man with aspirations. Sickening grotesques and smug, simple-minded acting.

results.summary_short: Dopey dudes vs. evil robot twins. Whoa! It's like mess confusion.

results.summary_short: Japanese officer prosecuted for P.O.W. crimes. Sincere, competent courtroom drama, doesn't match subject challenge.
